info.title: TxtSync
info.description: TxtSync enables applications to send and receive global SMS while tracking open rates and delivery reports. Please go to https://txtsync.com/microsoft-flow for more information and to create your account

post.description: Sends out a single SMS to an E164 number

From.description: The Sender ID or E164 number to send from
From.title: From

Message.description: The message body of the message
Message.title: Message

To.description: The mobile number to send the SMS to, ideally this number needs to include the country code and be in E164 format
To.title: To

post.description: Send SMS by List of Numbers or Tag Names

From.description: The Sender ID or E164 number to send from
From.title: From

items.description: List of E164 numbers to send to
items.title: To

items.description: List of tag names to send to. The tag must exist in TxtSync and have contacts allocated to it
items.title: To Tag Names

post.description: Raises a notification for an outbound SMS. Please note to protect you from potentially causing an infinite loop of sending SMS the Outbound SMS trigger is not invoked when sending an SMS from Flow

put.description: Updates a contact by the external system reference

MobileNumber.description: Contacts mobile number in E164 formatting
MobileNumber.title: Mobile Number

ExternalReference.description: External system reference to the contact
ExternalReference.title: External Reference

AllowSMS.description: Whether the contact wants to receive SMS
AllowSMS.title: Allow SMS

TagNames.description: CSV of tag names to apply to the contact E.G. Tag1,Tag2,Tag3
TagNames.title: Tag Names

FromNumber.description: The Sender ID or E164 number to send from
FromNumber.title: From Number

ToNumber.description: The mobile number to send the SMS to
ToNumber.title: To Number

Direction.description: Direction of the SMS. 0 is outbound and 1 is inbound
Direction.title: Direction

Message.description: The message body of the message
Message.title: Message

CreatedDate.description: The date (UTC) of when the SMS was created
CreatedDate.title: Created Date

Segments.description: The number of segments that the text message takes up

DeliveredDate.description: The date at which the text message was delivered

CampaignID.description: The campaign that the text message might be associated to

ApplicationID.description: The client application that the text message might be associated to

ApplicationName.description: The name of the client application that the text message might be associated to

UserID.description: The user identifier that is associated to the text message

UserName.description: The username of the client application that the text message might be associated to

ContactName.description: The name of the contact that the text message has been sent to

ProfileURL.description: The profile URl of the contact

LinkDetails.description: JSON object of the link details that are attached to the text message

IsFlagged.description: States whether the text message has been flagged with a message

FlaggedDate.description: The date when the text message was flagged with a message

FlaggedDescription.description: The message that has been flagged on the text message

CurrencyCode.description: The currency code of the local cost

CostLocal.description: The local currency cost of the text message

CostGBP.description: The GBP currency cost of the text message

ErrorCode.description: The error code of the text message if there was an issue in sending

Status.description: The status of the text message
